name: Break The Cycle
description:
A game about the life of Eva Smith , a victim of sexism harassment and stereotypes. The aim of tis game is to  highten awareness about sexism harassment and stereotypes.

Controls:

-left/right arrow to move

-1/2/3 to select answer in dialogues

-left click for the check in the first level and for the "yes" in the last level

Speech: 

-Green font is Eva

-Blue font is her mother

-Orange font is the boss

-Red font is the thugs

-Light gray font is narrator

Warning: for a hardly solvable reason, the web game's text box is very small/hard to read, It is much bigger in downloadable version. The game also has high resolution graphics making the load time for the browser version very long. For the best/full experience use the downloadable version.

I want to thank my classmate Zia for the beautiful graphics she hand drawn for the game.
